Battle.AutoStop: Press anything to stop Auto Battle.
Battle.AutoHelp: Sets party to Auto Battle mode.
Battle.SkillHelp: Opens a list of skills under the \C[16]%1\C[0] category.
Battle.ItemHelp: Opens a list of items that you can use.
Battle.AutoHelp2: Automatically choose an action suitable for combat.
Weapon.YarnDesc: Minami's favorite yarn balls that she found as a toddler.
Weapon.MafuWandDesc: A weapon that was invented by Telar. Also known as the "Wand of Dystopia".
Weapon.ShotgunDesc: The weakest weapon Genjiro ever created. But why even compare a gun to superweapons?
Weapon.OldKnifeDesc: A knife that Naemi found in a dumpster. Don't ask what she was doing there.
Weapon.ShurikenDesc: Really fit for a ninja. Just don't put them in your face.
Weapon.KatanaDesc: A good quality katana, perfect for a novice demon slayer.
Weapon.LeekDesc: You think it's just a veggie, and you completely underestimate the raw power of being completely useless.
Weapon.MagicWandDesc: A classic wand that can make enemies confused by whatever you are doing with it.
Weapon.DynamiteGunDesc: For mining, it's super useful. For fighting, it's super crazy.
Weapon.PickDesc: Allows you to mine through both rocks and your opponents.
Weapon.ElectroBallsDesc: Spheres imbued with the spark eleme- oh, I meant electricity - that you can safely throw, even if you're not from the Okimoto Family.
Weapon.LightbulbsBaneDesc: It's just a straight stick with a cloth hilt, but it makes light bulbs flicker with fear.
Weapon.EmeraldStaffDesc: Made of highest quality emeralds and tungsten, it can defeat many enemies with ease.
Weapon.PunchingGlovesDesc: Heavy gloves used for boxing. They're slightly burnt, but that's only cosmetic damage.
Armor.TelarNecklaceDesc: A mysterious necklace with enormous power that is passed down for generations in the Jriaed family.
Armor.ElementalCharmDesc: A charm that increases resistance to elemental attacks.
Armor.NinjaHeadbandDesc: A standard Ninja headband, made specially for Genins.
Armor.SamuraiArmorDesc: As the name suggests, it's a great armor.
Armor.ElectroOrbDesc: A mysterious ball that strengthens electric attacks and weakens the effects of electrocution.
Armor.LuckyCloverDesc: 4 leafed clover that significantly increases the frequency and power of critical hits at the expense of Attack.
Armor.MiningHelmetDesc: It has a light that is especially useful in mines.
Armor.MiningArmourDesc: A piece of clothing specially made to get extra dirty.
Armor.RubyCharmDesc: It increases your max HP. Nothing more, nothing less.
Armor.AmberCharmDesc: It increases your agility. Mining Speed? What's that?
Armor.TopazCharmDesc: It increases your experience gain. Good if one of your characters need to catch up to others.
Armor.JadeCharmDesc: It increases your luck, but try to drop it - it'll be suspiciously silent...
Armor.SapphireCharmDesc: It increases your mana. Don't give it to Naemi. It's not funny for her.
Armor.AmethystCharmDesc: It increases your defence. Maybe it'll save you from death - you can't know until it happens.
Armor.JasperCharmDesc: It increases your attack, but this extraordinarily rare pink hue makes you think if it shouldn't land in a museum.
Armor.OpalCharmDesc: It increases your magical defence. Don't use it against fire elementals though.
Armor.SimpleShieldDesc: Makes your guard slightly better. It's an accessory because it isn't as important to have a dedicated slot.
Armor.EvasionBootsDesc: An enchanted pair of boots that allows you to evade both physical and magical attacks more.
Armor.CounterTrophyDesc: An artefact that gives a small boost to crit chance.
Armor.SilverPouchDesc: These shiny bullets make your damage slightly higher, but only if you're using a gun. Some say that it's good against werewolves, but luckily they don't exist.
Skill.DesertWindstormDesc:
Summons a sandstorm, dealing damage to every enemy.
"Isn't Desert Windstorm just a more verbose way of saying Sandstorm?"
Skill.TrapDesc:
Sets up a trap, suprising the enemy and dealing high damage.
"Traps? That's my middle name!"
Skill.FightTacticDesc:
Improves the entire team's combat skills, increasing their attack for 2 turns.
"My knowledge of combat tactics and types of weapons is everything there is to read."
Skill.ShockDesc:
Shocks the enemy with electricity gained during the fight.
"Being Thor's descendant doesn't only mean immunity to electrocution!"
Skill.TeaseDesc:
Gets DEF and MDF buffs and makes the opponents target you more often.
"Maybe I'm not a teasing master, but this is good enough!"
Skill.CurseDesc:
Casts a curse, affecting both all enemies and yourself.
"Honestly, black magic was an interesting thing to study."
Skill.ScratchDesc:
Scratches the opponent, dealing some damage.
"Guess what? My nails are razor sharp!"
Skill.FireYarnDesc:
Summons a yarn ball set ablaze to hit enemies from behind.
"These yarn balls are infused with both Fire and Suprise!"
Skill.MasterPrecisionDesc:
Exchanges some attack for critical chance.
"Sometimes precision is everything that matters."
Skill.SelfFixDesc:
Fixes herself slightly, restoring one-fifth of max HP.
"If I'm not damaged beyond repair I can fix myself."
Skill.HealthRevengeDesc:
Deals 1.5x times the health lost of damage to one opponent.
"Don't attack me if thou want to survive this spell."
Skill.SkyDiveDesc:
Falls on an enemy straight from the sky, dealing some damage to herself in the process.
"Faster is better!"
Skill.CoolingDesc:
Deals a small amount of ice damage and freezes the enemy.
"Really useful when a computer is so hot that it could be used as a radiator."
Skill.BrickThrowDesc:
Throws a brick at the enemy, dealing heavy damage that bypasses half of the enemy's defence.
"Free bricks! Delivered straight to your face!"
Skill.DischargeDesc:
Discharges some power from the battery onto enemies.
"Don't worry Genjiro will recharge me in no time."
Skill.ChargeDesc:
Charges himself up, getting higher damage output. Can be stacked up to 3 times.
"The stronger I focus on making electricity, the stronger it gets!"
Skill.StatBattleDesc:
Combines the user's stats, reduces them by enemy's stats, and makes it the damage.
"Don't even dare to say that Luck is useless!"
Skill.PunchComboDesc:
Hits the enemy with a combo of two punches.
"Good punches are quintessential for victory on a ring."
Skill.PunchOfFireDesc:
Sets his fists on fire, making a few next attacks use fire. Might burn himself.
"My battle with that red-haired woman inspired me to try to make my fists on fire."
Skill.ChargeRefreshDesc:
Refreshes the built-up charge so it won't dissipate.
"Don't come close to me if you don't want to get electrocuted."
Skill.StrongAttackDesc: Performs a powerful attack on an enemy.
Skill.WillpowerDesc: Rouses the user’s fighting spirit and increases Attack. Usable up to 2 times in a row.
Skill.AntiFortificationDesc:
Deals higher damage to enemies that have higher magical defence.
"Hey! Defence is supposed to lower damage, not increase it!"
Skill.IntenseHeatDesc:
Deals fire damage to everyone, but won't burn anything.
"Cold? Maybe THIS will get you warmer!"
Skill.IceShockDesc:
Deals Ice damage to one enemy with a chance to freeze them.
"Too many ice shocks, and you're in an icy grave."
Skill.LightningSummonDesc:
Summons some lightning bolts that also paralyse the opponent.
"Hear that thunder? I'm gonna do it OVER AND OVER AND OVER!"
Skill.WaterSpringDesc:
Summons a water spring, damaging one enemy and making all others wet.
"Don't underestimate a water spring that's about to burst..."
Item.RamenDesc: Instant preparation, instant eating. What more could you want?
Item.BreadDesc: Perfect for making sandwiches, as an addition to meals, and for teleporting.
Item.BrokenDroneDesc: Packed drone parts with the addition of sand. Best to return it to Stephen.
Item.DesertNoteDesc: A note containing a powerful spell - Desert Windstorm.
Item.CakeDesc: Sweet for Minami, not extremely sweet for others.
Item.StarDesc: The main symbol of the Nijisaki Festival. How it got here?
Item.StarTrophyDesc: A trophy rewarded for collecting all \V[8] stars. Good job!
Item.TelarBookDesc: Telar's book that she wrote overnight. Instantly levels up Minami to level 5.
Item.RosolDesc: Stories say that instant soups were the invention of Roman Kluskowski, and thus they are called "Roman's Soup" in this region.
Item.BombDesc: Its inventor only wanted this to be used in mining, but obviously, it's also damn strong in fighting.
Item.GemDesc: Better find a place where they can pay you for this...
Item.EXPNote1Desc: A little note with a hint that might be useful during fights. Grants 100 EXP to the entire team.
Item.LuckSakuraDesc: Can you call Luck useless? It increases your crit damage, so probably not...
Item.AgilityPoppyDesc: After witnessing so many war casualities, this little flower could be called an less omnious-looking manjushage.
Item.AuctionNote1Desc: A note containing a powerful skill - Stat Battle.
Item.BantitNote1Desc: A note containing a powerful spell - Anti-Fortification.
Item.BantitNote2Desc: A note containing a powerful spell - Intense Heat.
Item.BantitNote3Desc: A note containing a powerful spell - Ice Shock.
Item.BantitNote4Desc: A note containing a powerful spell - Lightning Summon.
Item.BantitNote5Desc: A note containing a powerful spell - Water Spring.
Item.EggDesc: A normal-sized chicken egg. Wonder why Aster needs it for his experiment...
State.PoisonDesc:
Deals 2.5% of your HP as damage per turn.
"Unless you find an antidote, poison is a harbinger of death."
State.BlindDesc:
Reduces accuracy by 50%.
"Hey! Who turned the lights off?!"
State.SilenceDesc:
Disallows the use of spells.
"I got muggled out of my magic. Unfair."
State.RageDesc:
Forces to attack, instead of doing other things.
"*extremely pissed-off roar*"
State.ConfusionDesc:
Forces to attack anyone randomly, no matter if it's a friend or foe.
"Where am I? Who am I? What am I? Why am I? How am I?"
State.CharmDesc:
Forces to attack allies in favour of their enemies.
"You seem really nice. Why shouldn't I help you?"
State.SleepDesc:
Forces to cease doing anything.
"Why I'm soooo- *sleeps*"
State.ParalysisDesc:
Reduces all things related to accuracy and evasion by 25%.
"What'll it be, leaded or unleaded?"
State.FreezeDesc:
Disallows doing anything, unless the ice is shattered by an attack.
"You're lucky that it isn't snowgrave."
State.StunDesc:
Stuns the enemy for a little while, making them unable to fight back.
"ouch my ears"
State.BerylliosisDesc:
Poisons the enemy with beryllium, dealing 2.5% of HP as damage per turn.
"I wheeze as like my lungs burn inside..."
State.CurseDesc:
Removes 2.5% of HP, Mana and TP every turn.
"Dark magic isn't a force to underestimate."
State.BurnDesc:
Deals 2% of your HP as damage per turn.
"I'M ON FIRE!!! LITERALLY!"
State.PrecisionDesc:
Guaranteeds a critical hit every attack.
"Sometimes precision is everything that matters."
State.BleedDesc:
Weakens a variety of things, including your ability to use skills and defend, by 10%.
"It's hard to focus when you're aware that you're bleeding."
State.TeasingDesc:
Makes enemies more likely to attack you.
"Maybe I'm not a teasing master, but this is good enough!"
State.RainbowizedDesc:
Increases the elemental damage taken by 5%.
"Fire, Ice, Water, Electricity - All different, but all wonderful."
State.WetDesc:
Decreases all the main stats by 5%.
"Who enjoys having wet clothes?"
State.DischargedDesc:
Reduces TP gain by 50%.
"This is taking longer than expected. Maybe try with a better charger?"
State.WetMinamiDesc:
Decreases all the main stats by 7.5%.
"I just hate being wet."
State.TrappedDesc:
Forces to walk into a trap, dealing high damage to themself.
"How you can be so stupid to fall into a trap that obvious?"
State.FireFistsDesc:
Deals fire damage with the possibility of burning enemies.
"The only reason why I don't freak out seeing that, is that I made this myself."
State.Charge1Desc:
Increases attack, electrical damage, agility, evasion, TP charge, and healing from electrical damage.
"Electricity powers were passed down my family line since forever..."
State.Charge2Desc:
Increases attack, electrical damage, agility, evasion, TP charge, and healing from electrical damage.
"...but in my case, they are really potent."
State.Charge3Desc:
Increases attack, electrical damage, agility, evasion, TP charge, and healing from electrical damage. Normal attack deals electrical damage.
"Overall, don't underestimate my electricity, as you might get shocked."
